rows.label: qev065203_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]!
Got any leads on some quick cash?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0010
rows.name: Talk

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0011
rows.name: Speak with Professor B about Fortun.

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0020
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Professor B you haven't heard anything lately.

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0002
rows.name:
...What's that? An ancient metallic organism?
Meh. Doesn't sound very lucrative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0003
rows.name:
But it does sound truly amazing! Heh. It's been a while
since something's come along to tickle my researching
fancy. You've got my scholarly curiosity piqued, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0004
rows.name:
Right, bring that sucker on over then, kid. The great
Professor B will get to the bottom of this one
personally![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0005
rows.name:
Shame, that. Well, we're always waiting for promising
leads here, so if anything crops up, drop on by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0006
rows.name:
...I see. How truly amazing indeed. The metal's internal
structure has organized itself into a processing system
which manifested what you could rightly call a "will."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0007
rows.name: Not really something you see every day, this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0008
rows.name:
Who is this brute? Accessing data storage now...
Hmm? Data not found? No, that cannot be!
There is no information in all of space I do not know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, mark my words! I am Fortun, queen and keeper
of the galaxy's knowledge since time immemorial.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0010
rows.name:
My soul is not for the likes of you to touch,
you filthy animal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, she's certainly a fan of herself. Ha!
What say we dig in there and modify her personality
a little, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0012
rows.name:
If we switch her encryption AI personality out for a
chatty one, she'll happily tell you anything you could
think to ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0031
rows.name: Take Professor B up on his offer.

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Professor B if that's really possible.

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0013
rows.name:
Right then! I just need you to bring me a resonating
madonater and an octopus board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0014
rows.name:
Get me those, and I'll have her royal highness minding
her p's and q's in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0015
rows.name:
Still haven't learned not to doubt me, eh, kid?
Nothing is impossible for Professor B![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0016
rows.name:
You get me a resonating madonater and an octopus
board, and I'll have her royal highness minding her
p's and q's in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ha ha! You're about to find out what happens to
people who take a bossy tone with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0018
rows.name:
Bring me a resonating madonater and an octopus
board, and I'll turn this one into the sweetest little lady
you ever did meet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, thank science you're back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0020
rows.name:
This sucker was getting on my LAST nerve. Seriously,
another hour of that and I'd have smashed her to bits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0021
rows.name:
So hand over those materials, kid—I'm going to lose it
if I don't reprogram her right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0022
rows.name: All right, good. I'll get to work straightaway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Wakey wakey, eggs and bakey!
Time to be reborn, Fortun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0024
rows.name: Stop this. No... Do not tinkerrrr with mmmy soulll...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0025
rows.name:
I ammm queen of the Defffinians, keeperrr of the ggala-
galaxxxy's knowledge sinnnce time immemorialll...
I aaaaaaam Fffortun...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0026
rows.name: Nngh...aaaaugh! NnnooooOOOOOOOO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0027
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0028
rows.name:
Bingo! ...Hey there, Miss Fortun.
Why don't you introduce yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0029
rows.name:
I am Fortun, queen of the Definians and keeper of
the galaxy's knowledge since time immemorial!
Bow down before me, wretched fools![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well, crap. That's not actually different at all.
...The old girl's got grit, I'll give her that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0031
rows.name:
It will take more than a primate with a screwdriver to
remake me! You lose, fool! Nyah nyah nyaaaaaah!
Stupid ugly booger-face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0032
rows.name:
Though she DOES seems an awful lot less mature now.
I wouldn't be surprised if she cracked under a little bit
of interrogation at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0033
rows.name:
Nuh-uh, stupid! There's no way I'm telling your dumb
face that access code EVEEEEEER![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0034
rows.name:
Now heed me, [ST:playername ]!
I command you to kill everyone here and take me to
my daughters. And totally hurry it UP already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0050
rows.name: Tickle

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0051
rows.name: Tickle Fortun.

rows.label: qev065203_JNK0060
rows.name: Poke

rows.label: qev065203_SEL0061
rows.name: Give Fortun a firm nudge.

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0035
rows.name:
Wh-what are you—StoP THAT! AAGH, that tickles!
Ah hah! Ah hahaha, no! Ha ha hahaha HA haha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0036
rows.name:
Wh-what are you—OW! Stoppit, that... OWWW!
Quit it, you dang barbarian![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0037
rows.name:
A-all right! I'll talk! I'll give you the stupid access code!
Just stop this violence at once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0038
rows.name:
...Got it! Now if we can just take down the three
sisters, the organization driving my kind to crime will
crumble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0039
rows.name: Their base is in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0040
rows.name:
Oh, and I know their combat abilities are far beyond
my own, so be ready for a tough fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0041
rows.name:
Yeaaaaaah, it seems like there's a whole complicated
backstory thing going on here, but I won't ask.
You just go do whatever you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065203_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'm a busy bee, after all. No time to be wasting on
world peace with you flower-children hippies.
Still, this was an entertaining bit of research, so thanks.[ST:wait ]
